tool_description: ClustalW is a widely used bioinformatics tool for multiple sequence alignment of protein sequences. It aligns sequences to identify regions of similarity that may indicate functional, structural, or evolutionary relationships among the sequences.

required_parameters.name: protein_sequence
required_parameters.description: A single protein sequence or a set of protein sequences to be aligned using ClustalW.

return_values.name: protein_alignment
return_values.description: The resulting multiple sequence alignment of the provided protein sequences.
